TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DllImportAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DllImportAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DllImportAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示该属性化方法由非托管动态链接库 (DLL) 作为静态入口点公开。

span.span: Indicates that the attributed method is exposed by an unmanaged dynamic-link library (DLL) as a static entry point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以将此特性应用于方法。You can apply this attribute to methods. 特性提供调用从非托管 DLL 导出的函数所需的信息。The attribute provides the information needed to call a function exported from an unmanaged DLL. 至少必须提供包含入口点的 DLL 的名称。As a minimum requirement, you must supply the name of the DLL containing the entry point. 将此特性直接应用于C#和C++方法定义;但是, 在使用`Declare`语句时, Visual Basic 编译器会发出此特性。You apply this attribute directly to C# and C++ method definitions; however, the Visual Basic compiler emits this attribute when you use the `Declare` statement. 对于包括、、 、、或字段的复杂方法定义,将此特性直接应用于VisualBasic方法定义。 For complex method definitions that include , , , , , or fields, you apply this attribute directly to Visual Basic method definitions. **注意**JScript 不支持此特性。**Note** JScript does not support this attribute. 可以使用C#或 Visual Basic 包装器类从 JScript 程序访问非托管 API 方法。You can use C# or Visual Basic wrapper classes to access unmanaged API methods from JScript programs. 有关使用平台调用服务访问非托管 Dll 中的函数的其他信息, 请参阅使用[非托管 Dll 函数](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md)。For additional information about using the platform invoke service to access functions in unmanaged DLLs, see [Consuming Unmanaged DLL Functions](~/docs/framework/interop/consuming-unmanaged-dll-functions.md). > [!NOTE] > 不支持对泛型类型进行封送处理。The does not support marshaling of generic types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性导入 Win32 `MessageBox`函数。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 然后, 该代码示例调用导入的方法。The code example then calls the imported method. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string dllName) cil managed

param.name: dllName
param.span: 包含非托管方法的 DLL 的名称。

span.span: The name of the DLL that contains the unmanaged method.

param.span: 如果 DLL 包含在某个程序集中，则可以包含程序集显示名称。

span.span: This can include an assembly display name, if the DLL is included in an assembly.

summary.span: 使用包含要导入的方法的 DLL 的名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the name of the DLL containing the method to import.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果程序集中包含非托管 DLL 文件, 例如, 通过使用链接器或`/linkresource`编译器选项, 则可以将程序集显示名称指定为的`dllName`一部分。If an unmanaged DLL file is included in an assembly, for example, by using the linker or the `/linkresource` compiler option, you can specify the assembly display name as part of `dllName`. 例如, 如果名`unmanaged.dll`为的非托管 DLL 包含在名`MyAssembly`为的托管程序集中, 则可以指定属性, 如下面的代码所示。For example, if an unmanaged DLL named `unmanaged.dll` is included in a managed assembly named `MyAssembly`, the attribute might be specified as shown in the following code. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#2)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性导入 Win32 `MessageBox`函数。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 然后, 该代码示例调用导入的方法。The code example then calls the imported method. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将 Unicode 字符转换为 ANSI 字符时，启用或禁用最佳映射行为。

span.span: Enables or disables best-fit mapping behavior when converting Unicode characters to ANSI characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`true`为, 则启用最佳映射行为; 否则, 将禁用最佳映射。If `true`, best-fit mapping behavior is enabled; otherwise, best-fit mapping is disabled. 默认情况下`true` , 该字段为。The field is `true` by default. 此字段的设置将覆盖特性的任何级别设置。Settings for this field override the any level settings for the attribute. 公共语言运行时将任何托管的 Unicode 字符转换为 ANSI 字符, 这些字符传递给在 Windows 98 或 Windows Me 上执行的非托管方法。The common language runtime converts to ANSI characters any managed Unicode characters passed to an unmanaged method executing on Windows 98 or Windows Me. 最佳映射允许互操作封送拆收器在不存在精确匹配时提供一个匹配的字符。Best-fit mapping enables the interop marshaler to provide a close-matching character when no exact match exists. 例如, 封送拆收器将接受 ANSI 字符的非托管方法的 Unicode 版权字符转换为 "c"。For example, the marshaler converts the Unicode copyright character to 'c' for unmanaged methods that accept ANSI characters. 某些字符缺乏最佳表示形式;这些字符称为无法映射。Some characters lack a best-fit representation; these characters are called unmappable. 无法映射的字符通常转换为默认值 "？"ANSI 字符。Unmappable characters are usually converted to the default '?' ANSI character. > [!CAUTION] > 某些 Unicode 字符将转换为危险字符, 如反斜杠 "\\" 字符, 这可能会无意中更改路径。Certain Unicode characters are converted to dangerous characters, such as the backslash '\\' character, which can inadvertently change a path. 通过将字段设置为`true`, 可以通过引发异常来向调用方发出无法映射的字符的信号。By setting the field to `true`, you can signal the presence of an unmappable character to the caller by throwing an exception. > [!CAUTION] > 将和字段的托管数组传递到非托管安全数组时, 不能更改和字段提供的默认值。You cannot change the default values provided by the and fields when passing a managed array whose elements are ANSI Chars or LPSTRs to an unmanaged safe array. 最佳映射始终处于启用状态, 并且不会引发异常。Best-fit mapping is always enabled and no exception is thrown. 请注意, 此组合可能会危及安全模型。Be aware that this combination can compromise your security model. ## Examples 在某些情况下, Visual Basic 开发人员使用而不`Declare`是语句来定义托管代码中的 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是这两种情况之一。Setting the field is one of those cases. 下面的示例演示如何通过以下方法将最严格的字符映射安全应用到平台调用方法定义: 指定 ANSI 字符集, 禁用最佳匹配映射行为, 并在未映射的 Unicode 字符上引发异常。The following example shows how to apply the strictest character mapping security to a platform invoke method definitions by specifying the ANSI character set, disabling best fit mapping behavior, and throwing an exception on unmapped Unicode characters. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

summary.span: 指示入口点的调用约定。

span.span: Indicates the calling convention of an entry point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此字段设置为枚举成员之一。You set this field to one of the enumeration members. 该字段的默认值为, 默认值为 "约定"。The default value for the field is , which in turn defaults to convention. ## Examples 在某些情况下, Visual Basic 开发人员使用而不`Declare`是语句来定义托管代码中的 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是这两种情况之一。Setting the field is one of those cases. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指示如何向方法封送字符串参数，并控制名称重整。

span.span: Indicates how to marshal string parameters to the method and controls name mangling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此字段与枚举的成员一起使用, 以指定字符串参数的封送处理行为, 并指定要调用的入口点名称 (给定的准确名称或以 "a" 或 "W" 结尾的名称)。Use this field with a member of the enumeration to specify the marshaling behavior of string parameters and to specify which entry-point name to invoke (the exact name given or a name ending with "A" or "W"). C#和 Visual Basic 的默认枚举成员`CharSet.Ansi`为, 而的默认C++ `CharSet.None`枚举成员为, 它等效于`CharSet.Ansi`。The default enumeration member for C# and Visual Basic is `CharSet.Ansi` and the default enumeration member for C++ is `CharSet.None`, which is equivalent to `CharSet.Ansi`. 在 Visual Basic 中, 使用`Declare`语句`CharSet`指定字段。In Visual Basic, you use the `Declare` statement to specify the `CharSet` field. 字段会影响`CharSet`字段的行为, 以确定要调用的入口点名称。 The field influences the behavior of the `CharSet` field in determining which entry-point name to invoke. 有关与`CharSet`字段关联的字符串封送处理和名称匹配行为的详细说明和示例, 请参阅[指定字符集](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-a-character-set.md)。For a detailed description and examples of the string marshaling and name matching behavior associated with the `CharSet` field, see [Specifying a Character Set](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-a-character-set.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性导入 Win32 `MessageBox`函数。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 然后, 该代码示例调用导入的方法。The code example then calls the imported method. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.Canonical/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指示要调用的 DLL 入口点的名称或序号。

span.span: Indicates the name or ordinal of the DLL entry point to be called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过提供指示包含入口点的 DLL 的名称的字符串指定入口点名称, 也可以通过其序号标识入口点。You can specify the entry-point name by supplying a string indicating the name of the DLL containing the entry point, or you can identify the entry point by its ordinal. 序数前面带有 # 号, 例如 #1。Ordinals are prefixed with the # sign, for example, #1. 如果省略此字段, 则公共语言运行时将使用用标记的 the.NET 方法的名称。If you omit this field, the common language runtime uses the name of the.NET method marked with the . 有关其他信息, 请参阅[在 dll 中标识函数](~/docs/framework/interop/identifying-functions-in-dlls.md)。For additional information, see [Identifying Functions in DLLs](~/docs/framework/interop/identifying-functions-in-dlls.md). 有关显示如何使用字段的示例, 请参阅[指定入口点](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-an-entry-point.md)。For examples showing how to use the field, see [Specifying an Entry Point](~/docs/framework/interop/specifying-an-entry-point.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性导入 Win32 `MessageBox`函数。The following code example shows how to use the attribute to import the Win32 `MessageBox` function. 此代码示例使用属性指定要导入的函数, 然后将名称更改为。 `MyNewMessageBoxMethod`The code example uses the property to specify the function to import and then changes the name to `MyNewMessageBoxMethod`. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport.EntryPoint/vb/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 控制 字段是否使公共语言运行时在非托管 DLL 中搜索入口点名称，而不使用指定的入口点名称。

span.span: Controls whether the field causes the common language runtime to search an unmanaged DLL for entry-point names other than the one specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`false`为, 则当字段设置为`CharSet.Ansi`时, 将调用追加了字母 A 的入口点名称, 并且当字段设置为时, 将`CharSet.Unicode`调用附加了字母 W 的入口点名称。If `false`, the entry point name appended with the letter A is invoked when the field is set to `CharSet.Ansi`, and the entry-point name appended with the letter W is invoked when the field is set to the `CharSet.Unicode`. 通常, 托管编译器将设置此字段。Typically, managed compilers set this field. 下表显示了和字段之间的关系, 这取决于编程语言所强加的默认值。The following table shows the relationship between the and fields, based on default values imposed by the programming language. 您可以重写默认设置, 但请谨慎操作。You can override the default setting, but do so with caution. |语言Language|ANSIANSI|UnicodeUnicode|自动Auto| |--------------|----------|-------------|----------| |Visual BasicVisual Basic|ExactSpelling:=TrueExactSpelling:=True|ExactSpelling:=TrueExactSpelling:=True|ExactSpelling:=FalseExactSpelling:=False| |C#C#|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false| |C++C++|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false|ExactSpelling=falseExactSpelling=false| ## Examples 在某些情况下, Visual Basic 开发人员使用, 而不是`Declare`使用语句在托管代码中定义 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of using the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是这两种情况之一。Setting the field is one of those cases. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#4)]

summary.span: 指示是否直接转换具有 或 返回值的非托管方法，或是否自动将 或 返回值转换为异常。

span.span: Indicates whether unmanaged methods that have or return values are directly translated or whether or return values are automatically converted to exceptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `retval` `HRESULT` `false` `retval` `HRESULT`将字段设置为`true`以直接将非托管签名与或值进行转换; 将其设置为可自动将或值转换为异常。 Set the field to `true` to directly translate unmanaged signatures with `HRESULT` or `retval` values; set it to `false` to automatically convert `HRESULT` or `retval` values to exceptions. 默认情况下, 字段为`true`。By default, the field is `true`. 如果`true`为, 则生成的方法签名返回一个`HRESULT`包含值的整数值。When `true`, the resulting method signature returns an integer value that contains the `HRESULT` value. 在这种情况下, 您必须手动检查返回值, 并在应用程序中相应地做出响应。In this case, you must manually inspect the return value and respond accordingly in your application. 将字段设置为`false`时, 生成的方法签名包含 void 返回类型, 而不是整数 (`HRESULT`) 返回类型。When you set the field to `false`, the resulting method signature contains a void return type instead of an integer (`HRESULT`) return type. 当非托管方法生成`HRESULT`时, 运行时将自动忽略 (或 0) 的`S_OK`返回值, 并且不会引发异常。When the unmanaged method produces an `HRESULT`, the runtime automatically ignores a return value of `S_OK` (or 0) and does not throw an exception. 对于`HRESULT`以外的`HRESULT`, 运行时将自动引发与对应的异常。 `S_OK`For `HRESULT`s other than `S_OK`, the runtime automatically throws an exception that corresponds to the `HRESULT`. 请注意, 属性仅对`HRESULT`返回的方法执行此转换。Note that the attribute only performs this conversion to methods that return an `HRESULT`. 当异常更适合应用程序的错误报告结构时`HRESULT`, 您可以决定将默认错误报告行为从更改为异常。You might decide to change the default error reporting behavior from `HRESULT`s to exceptions in cases where exceptions better fit the error reporting structure of your application. 此字段类似于, 但与字段不同的是, 属性的默认值为`false`。This field is similar to the ; however, in contrast to the field, the default value for the attribute is `false`. 在某些情况下, Visual Basic 开发人员使用, 而不是`Declare`使用语句在托管代码中定义 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of using the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是这两种情况之一。Setting the field is one of those cases. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用将非托管`SHAutoComplete`函数一次性导入, 并将字段设置`true`为, 并再次将字段设置`false`为。The following code example uses the to import the unmanaged `SHAutoComplete` function once with the field set to `true` and again with the field set to `false`. 此代码示例将`SHAutoComplete`导致函数生成任何错误, `HRESULT`并引发一次异常和下一个。This code example causes the `SHAutoComplete` function to generate any errors with an exception one time and an `HRESULT` the next. [!code-csharp[Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.InteropServices.PreserveSigAttribute/vb/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指示被调用方在从属性化方法返回之前是否调用 Windows API 函数。

span.span: Indicates whether the callee calls the Windows API function before returning from the attributed method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`如果指示被调用方将调用`SetLastError`, `false`则为; 否则为。`true` to indicate that the callee will call `SetLastError`; otherwise, `false`. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 运行时封送`GetLastError`拆收器调用并缓存返回的值, 以防止其他 API 调用覆盖它。The runtime marshaler calls `GetLastError` and caches the value returned to prevent it from being overwritten by other API calls. 可以通过调用来检索错误代码。You can retrieve the error code by calling . ## Examples 在某些情况下, Visual Basic 开发人员使用, 而不是`Declare`使用语句在托管代码中定义 DLL 函数。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the , instead of using the `Declare` statement, to define a DLL function in managed code. 设置字段是这两种情况之一。Setting the field is one of those cases. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#5)]

summary.span: 启用或禁用在遇到已被转换为 ANSI“?”字符的无法映射的 Unicode 字符时引发异常。

span.span: Enables or disables the throwing of an exception on an unmappable Unicode character that is converted to an ANSI "?" character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true`如果为, 则指示每次互操作封送拆收器转换一个不可映射的字符时引发异常;`false`指示该字段处于禁用状态。`true` to indicate that an exception is thrown each time the interop marshaler converts an unmappable character; `false` to indicate that the field is disabled. 默认情况下`false` , 此字段为。This field is `false` by default. 公共语言运行时将任何托管的 Unicode 字符转换为 ANSI 字符, 这些字符传递给在 Windows 98 或 Windows Me 上执行的非托管方法。The common language runtime converts to ANSI characters any managed Unicode characters passed to an unmanaged method executing on Windows 98 or Windows Me. 最佳映射允许互操作封送拆收器在不存在精确匹配时提供一个匹配的字符。Best-fit mapping enables the interop marshaler to provide a close-matching character when no exact match exists. 例如, 封送拆收器将接受 ANSI 字符的非托管方法的 Unicode 版权字符转换为 "c"。For example, the marshaler converts the Unicode copyright character to 'c' for unmanaged methods that accept ANSI characters. 某些字符缺乏最佳表示形式;这些字符称为无法映射。Some characters lack a best-fit representation; these characters are called unmappable. 无法映射的字符通常转换为默认值 "？"ANSI 字符。Unmappable characters are usually converted to the default '?' ANSI character. > [!CAUTION] > 某些 Unicode 字符将转换为危险字符, 如反斜杠 "\\" 字符, 这可能会无意中更改路径。Certain Unicode characters are converted to dangerous characters, such as the backslash '\\' character, which can inadvertently change a path. 通过将字段设置为`true`, 可以通过引发异常来向调用方发出无法映射的字符的信号。By setting the field to `true`, you can signal the presence of an unmappable character to the caller by throwing an exception. > [!CAUTION] > 将和字段的托管数组传递到非托管安全数组时, 不能更改和字段提供的默认值。You cannot change the default values provided by the and fields when passing a managed array whose elements are ANSI Chars or LPSTRs to an unmanaged safe array. 最佳映射始终处于启用状态, 并且不会引发异常。Best-fit mapping is always enabled and no exception is thrown. 请注意, 此组合可能会危及安全模型。Be aware that this combination can compromise your security model. ## Examples 在某些情况下, Visual Basic 开发人员使用在托管代码中定义 DLL 函数, 而不是`Declare`使用语句。In some cases, Visual Basic developers use the to define a DLL function in managed code, instead of using the `Declare` statement. 设置字段是这两种情况之一。Setting the field is one of those cases. 下面的示例演示如何通过以下方法将最严格的字符映射安全应用到平台调用方法定义: 指定 ANSI 字符集, 禁用最佳匹配映射行为, 并在未映射的 Unicode 字符上引发异常。The following example shows how to apply the strictest character mapping security to a platform invoke method definitions by specifying the ANSI character set, disabling best fit mapping behavior, and throwing an exception on unmapped Unicode characters. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cpp/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.interopservices.dllimportattribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含入口点的 DLL 文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the DLL file that contains the entry point.

value.span: 包含入口点的 DLL 文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the DLL file that contains the entry point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以提供完整路径或相对路径。You can provide a full or relative path. 如果不提供路径, 则 DLL 必须在运行时位于当前路径中, 除非该 DLL 是通过其他方法加载的。If you provide no path, the DLL must be in the current path at run time, unless the DLL is loaded by some other means. 但请注意, 如果移动了 DLL, 则使用完全限定路径会引入导致。Be aware, however, that using a fully qualified path can introduce inaccuracy if the DLL is moved.
